headline: Netflix (NasdaqGS:NFLX) Sees 13% Price Increase in Last Month
summary: In the wake of significant corporate developments, Netflix (NasdaqGS:NFLX) experienced a 13% price increase over the past month. The company's robust Q1 2025 earnings report, showcasing a substantial rise in sales and net income, coupled with a positive earnings guidance for the year, likely supported investor confidence. The announcement of Reed Hastings transitioning to a non-executive role as Chairman could also have influenced sentiments positively. Furthermore, substantial share buybacks...

headline: Now Streaming: Analysts boost Netflix targets after Q1 beat
summary: “Now Streaming” is The Fly’s weekly recap of the stories surrounding the biggest content streamers. PLAYING THIS WEEKEND: Among this weekend’s highly-anticipated new streaming content is the first few episodes of “Andor,” a drama series set in the “Star Wars” universe, on Disney+ (DIS). headline: Nvidia stock slides, Apple gets a warning, and Tesla short-sellers cash in: Markets news roundup

headline: Is Netflix the Perfect Recession Stock?
summary: Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX) has changed the media landscape, not once but twice.  Both times it used a subscription model.  It could be the perfect recession stock, but does that make it worth buying today?

headline: 2 Monster Stocks to Buy in the Wake of the Nasdaq Correction
summary: The Nasdaq Composite is down 16% year to date at the time of writing.  It's never easy to stay focused on the long term when a market correction strikes.  The following two companies are competitively positioned for growth in digital advertising and entertainment.
